amendment.purpose: An amendmend numbered 221 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike section 906 in title IX which would eliminate the provision of the bill which subjects the NCUA to appropriations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amodei amendment (A171) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Amodei amendment (A171) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A171) offered by Mr. Amodei.
